box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;

div.div:
- Ingest Docs
- Generate Embeddiings
- Store Embeddings (FAISS)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 178px; height: 1px; padding-top: 375px; margin-left: 412px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
- LangChain RAG
- Retrieve via FAISS index
- LLM: Output answers
- Chain: Orchestrates query -> Retrieaval -> Generation

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 168px; height: 1px; padding-top: 410px; margin-left: 742px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
- RAGAS Computes Metrics
- Faithfulness: Is answer grounded?
- Answer Relevance: Does the answer match the query intent
- Context precision/recall: How well did FAISS retrieve relevant chuncks
- Semantic similarity: Embedding-based cosine similarity between query, retrieved docs, and generated answer

div.h3:
Query:
“What is the capital of France?”

p.span:
Retrieved context:
"Paris is the capital of France."
Generated answer:
"The capital of France is Paris."

switch.text: Query: “What is the capital of France?”...
